pageSetting.title: 存款账户基数调整导入

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update zhjstzdr2_temp t set t.error=t.error||'调整日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMMdd!' where f_java_rule_date(t.tzrq,'yyyyMMdd')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update zhjstzdr2_temp t set t.error=t.error||'调整日期输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.tzrq)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update zhjstzdr2_temp t set t.error=t.error||'账号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zhdh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update zhjstzdr2_temp t set t.error=t.error||'子账号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zzh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update zhjstzdr2_temp t set t.error=t.error||'账户名称输入错误，长度不能超过:100!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zhhm)>100 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update zhjstzdr2_temp t set t.error=t.error||'调整基数输入错误，只能输入:17位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.tzjs)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.tzjs,17,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update zhjstzdr2_temp t set t.error=t.error||'调整基数输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.tzjs)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update zhjstzdr2_temp t set t.error=t.error||'调整原因输入错误，长度不能超过:100!' where f_java_rule_length(t.tzyy)>100 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update zhjstzdr2_temp t set error=error||'调整日期必须在统计日期的本'||substr(F_NUMTOCHAR($sysdate$) ,1,4)||'年内' where substr(t.tzrq,1,4) != substr(F_NUMTOCHAR($sysdate$),1,4) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update zhjstzdr2_temp t set t.error=t.error||'基数账户不存在或者子账号不匹配' where not exists(select 1 from jxdx_ckzh zh where t.zhdh=zh.zhdh and coalesce(t.zzh,'1')=coalesce(zh.zzh,'1') and cast(t.tzrq AS INTEGER) >= zh.khrq) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update zhjstzdr2_temp t set error=error||'调整基数必须大于0!' where f_java_rule_length(t.tzjs)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.tzjs,17,2)=0 and cast(t.tzjs as integer)<0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update zhjstzdr2_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists(select 1 from SGDR_CKJSZH_TZJS tar ,JXDX_CKZH JXDX_CKZH0 where 1=1 and t.zhdh=JXDX_CKZH0.ZHDH and JXDX_CKZH0.JXDXDH=tar.JXDXDH and tar.QSRQ >= cast(t.tzrq as DECIMAL(38,0)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update zhjstzdr2_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select zhdh,tzrq from zhjstzdr2_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by zhdh,tzrq having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.zhdh=dr.zhdh and t.tzrq=dr.tzrq) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE zhjstzdr2_temp ( tzrq varchar(100) , zhdh varchar(100) , zzh varchar(100) , zhhm varchar(100) , tzjs varchar(100) , tzyy varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from zhjstzdr2_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from zhjstzdr2_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tzrq,zhdh,zzh,zhhm,tzjs,tzyy,khdxdh,error from zhjstzdr2_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, tzrq,zhdh,zzh,zhhm,tzjs,tzyy,khdxdh,error from zhjstzdr2_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tzrq,zhdh,zzh,zhhm,tzjs,tzyy,khdxdh,error from zhjstzdr2_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGDR_CKJSZH_TZJS tar where exists ( select 1 from $temp$ t ,JXDX_CKZH JXDX_CKZH0 where (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null or t.error ='数据已存在!') and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and cast(t.zhdh as VARCHAR(40) )=JXDX_CKZH0.ZHDH and JXDX_CKZH0.JXDXDH=tar.JXDXDH and tar.qsrq>= cast(t.tzrq as integer) )
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGDR_CKJSZH_TZJS tar set jsrq=(select F_Change_Days(cast(dr.tzrq as Integer),-1) from zhjstzdr2_temp dr,JXDX_CKZH JXDX_CKZH0 where 1=1 and cast(dr.zhdh as VARCHAR(40) )=JXDX_CKZH0.ZHDH and JXDX_CKZH0.JXDXDH=tar.JXDXDH and (length(dr.error)=0 or dr.error is null or dr.error='数据已存在!') and dr.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$) where exists( select 1 from zhjstzdr2_temp t ,JXDX_CKZH JXDX_CKZH0 where 1=1 and cast(t.zhdh as VARCHAR(40) )=JXDX_CKZH0.ZHDH and JXDX_CKZH0.JXDXDH=tar.JXDXDH and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null or t.error='数据已存在!') and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and tar.jsrq>=F_Change_Days(cast(t.tzrq as Integer),-1))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGDR_CKJSZH_TZJS tar set jsrq=(select F_Change_Days(cast(dr.tzrq as Integer),-1) from zhjstzdr_temp dr,JXDX_CKZH JXDX_CKZH0 where 1=1 and dr.zhdh=JXDX_CKZH0.ZHDH and JXDX_CKZH0.JXDXDH=tar.JXDXDH and (length(dr.error)=0 or dr.error is null) and dr.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$) where exists( select 1 from zhjstzdr_temp t ,JXDX_CKZH JXDX_CKZH0 where 1=1 and t.zhdh=JXDX_CKZH0.ZHDH and JXDX_CKZH0.JXDXDH=tar.JXDXDH and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and tar.jsrq=(cast(substr(t.tzrq,1,4)||'1231' as integer)) )
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGDR_CKJSZH_TZJS(JXDXDH,QSRQ,JSRQ,ZHDH,ZZH,ZHHM,KHH,TZLJ,TZJS,TZYY) select JXDX_CKZH0.JXDXDH,cast (t.tzrq as DECIMAL(38,0)),29991231, t.zhdh , t.zzh ,JXDX_CKZH0.ZHHM,JXDX_CKZH0.KHH,0,cast (t.tzjs as DECIMAL(25,4)), t.tzyy from zhjstzdr2_temp t ,JXDX_CKZH JXDX_CKZH0 where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) and JXDX_CKZH0.ZHDH=cast (t.zhdh as VARCHAR(40))
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update sgdr_ckjszh_tzjs set jsrq=cast(substr(cast(qsrq as char(8)),1,4)||'1231' as integer) where jsrq=29991231

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGDR_CKJSZH_TZJS tz set tzlj= (select coalesce(t.tzlj,0) from JXDX_CKJSZH_$sysdate_yyyy$ js,SGDR_CKJSZH_TZJS t where tz.jxdxdh=js.jxdxdh and tz.jxdxdh=t.jxdxdh and F_CHANGE_DAYS (tz.qsrq, -1)>=t.qsrq AND F_CHANGE_DAYS (tz.qsrq, -1)<=t.jsrq) where exists(select 1 from zhjstzdr_temp temp where tz.zhdh=temp.zhdh and cast(temp.tzrq as integer) between tz.qsrq and tz.jsrq and temp.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and exists(select 1 from SGDR_CKJSZH_TZJS o where o.jxdxdh=tz.jxdxdh and o.qsrq<tz.qsrq) )

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGDR_CKJSZH_TZJS tz set tzlj=tzlj+tzjs where exists(select 1 from zhjstzdr_temp t where tz.zhdh=t.zhdh and cast(t.tzrq as integer) between tz.qsrq and tz.jsrq and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )
